TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SimpleCursorTreeAdapter extends Android.Widget.ResourceCursorTreeAdapter

Docs.summary: An easy adapter to map columns from a cursor to TextViews or ImageViews defined in an XML file.

remarks.para:
An easy adapter to map columns from a cursor to TextViews or ImageViews defined in an XML file. You can specify which columns you want, which views you want to display the columns, and the XML file that defines the appearance of these views. Separate XML files for child and groups are possible.
Binding occurs in two phases. First, if a is available,
is invoked. If the returned value is true, binding has occurred. If the returned value is false and the view to bind is a TextView, is invoked. If the returned value is false and the view to bind is an ImageView, is invoked. If no appropriate binding can be found, an is thrown.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void SetViewImage (Android.Widget.ImageView v, string value);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetViewImage(class Android.Widget.ImageView v, string value) cil managed

Docs.param: the value retrieved from the cursor
Docs.summary: Called by bindView() to set the image for an ImageView.

remarks.para: Called by bindView() to set the image for an ImageView. By default, the value will be treated as a Uri. Intended to be overridden by Adapters that need to filter strings retrieved from the database.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void SetViewText (Android.Widget.TextView v, string text);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetViewText(class Android.Widget.TextView v, string text) cil managed

Docs.param: the text to be set for the TextView
Docs.summary: Called by bindView() to set the text for a TextView but only if there is no existing ViewBinder or if the existing ViewBinder cannot handle binding to a TextView.

remarks.para:
Called by bindView() to set the text for a TextView but only if there is no existing ViewBinder or if the existing ViewBinder cannot handle binding to a TextView.
Intended to be overridden by Adapters that need to filter strings retrieved from the database.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override Type ThresholdType { get; }
.property instance class System.Type ThresholdType

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which provides the declaring type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control virtual vs. non virtual method dispatch against the underlying JNI object. When this property is equal to the declaring type, then virtual method invocation against the JNI object is performed; otherwise, we assume that the method was overridden by a derived type, and perform non-virtual methdo invocation.
